attributes.action: UK Referendum to ban the use a of a "covid certificate" in any circumstances.
attributes.additional_details:
Any form of covid certificate discriminates against unvaccinated people and leads to indirect obligation to get vaccinated.
It is against the human, equal and discrimination rights of people to have "health authoritarianism" imposed on them.
The government should not have undemocratic and dangerous extensions of its powers
There should be no extensive electronic surveillance, such as contact-tracing.
Any form of covid certification creates division in society and threatens social peace/freedoms.
attributes.background:
The government as a matter of urgency to bring to Parliament for approval, legislation to have a Referendum on the above subject, within a period of a maximum of six months.
No form of covid certificate to be allowed to be used for any work, travel or any other purposes, both indoors and outdoors.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the use of certificates relating to Covid, but your petition refers to a referendum, but then goes on to say that no form of Covid certificate should be allowed to be used for any work, travel or any other purposes, both indoors and outdoors. It's therefore not clear if you want a referendum, or simply for the use of such certificates to be banned.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239

Do not require a Covid passport for access to any services, jobs or events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
